message.body: Hey Charles its lindsey! Any chance you are available tomorrow for a 10 am shoot in west philly?
I know it's last minute but Chris Kellet, our main sound guy has had a personal emergency.
And would LOVE for you to fill in.
Ahh! I can't :/ my boss is returning from two weeks out and I have a lot to go over with him...I can lend you guys my audio kit if that helps at all? Sorry!
Actually I might take you up on that. Are you home today? I'm about to pickup gear on spring garden.
We can also pay a rental fee:)
Hey sorry I'm shooting interviews till around 6
I drove though so I can drop stuff off
You are amazing. I can meet you when you are done. I'm at 50th and chestnut but have a car so whatever is easiest. Thanks a million!
Great, ill let you know when I'm free!
Thanks dude!
Hey we're running late - can you meet me around temple 7ish?
Sure thing. Want to meet in back of Anderson?
That works - do you need a c-stand as well?
The ones I have are for the kinos. I'll take one if you can spare it. My arms are weak!
I'll probably be closer to 7:20
Could also do your house if that's easier. I think it's closer to me...
Yeah no problem, can we meet at the crane arts building then? Master and American...and 730 works for me
Perfect!
See you in an hour.
I'm here, parked in one of the spots across the street
